about.alexandre-description: Passionate about Frontend development, Alexandre designed the user interface and implemented the threads.
about.alon-description: Alon implemented the instant messaging system, allowing smooth communication between group members.
about.description1: Gifty is an application that facilitates gift organization between friends and family. This project is developed as part of our learning at the Wild Code School.
about.description2: We would like to thank the Wild Code School for their support and for giving us the opportunity to carry out this project.
about.jasmine-description: Jasmine designed the group creation feature, ensuring Gifty is user-friendly and enjoyable to use.
about.robin-description: Robin developed the registration, login, and user profile management, ensuring account security.
about.title: About

add-valid-email: Please add a valid email adress.

alert.delete-group: Are you sure you want to delete this group ?

character-limit: Password must be atleast 8 character long

heading-organize: Organize your Christmas present in group with
join-to-start: Join an existing group or create a new one to start exchanging presents ideas with your friends !

legal-notices.title: Legal notices
legal-notices.content: Gifty is an application developed by students from Wild Code School. The interfaces are created with Chakra UI, and the illustrations are provided by Storyset.
legal-notices.property: All elements of the site, including images, texts and code, are the property of the developers and cannot be reused without their permission.

my-group: You are a member of {{groupCount}} group
my-groups-list: You are a member of {{groupCount}} groups
no-group-warning: It seems like you're not part of any chat group
password-lowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
password-uppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
placeholder-add-member-email: Insert a member's email to add him
placeholder-name-your-group: Give a name to your group
step1-description: Start by creating your family group or friend group to organize the Christmas presents in a more collaborative way.
step2: Step 2 : Invite your friends and your family
step2-description: Invite every member of your group to join the app so they can suggest present ideas.
step3-description: Create presents lists for every member of the group, discuss ideas and choose the perfect present to make Christmas an unforgettable party.

error.add-member: An error occurred while adding the members
error.add-member-exist: The user with the email {{email}} is already a member of the group
error.add-member-provided: Please provide at least one member
error.create-group: An error occurred while creating the group
error.validate-profile: An error occurred during profile validation

success.add-member-description: The members have been successfully added.
success.delete-group-description: Your group {{groupName}} has been successfully deleted.
success.group-created-description: Your group {{groupName}} has been successfully created.
success.validate-profile-description: Your profile has been successfully validated.

validate-data.email-list: Please add the member to the list
validate-data.email-type: The email address must be in the format 'name@domain.com'.
validate-data.firstname-length: The first name must contain at least 2 characters.
validate-data.firstname-type: The first name must contain only letters.
validate-data.helper-password: The password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
validate-data.group-name-length: The group name must contain at least 2 characters.
validate-data.lastname-length: The last name must contain at least 2 characters.
validate-data.lastname-type: The last name must contain only letters.
validate-data.password-length: The password must be at least 8 characters long
validate-data.password-lowercase: The password must contain a lowercase letter
validate-data.password-number: The password must contain a number
validate-data.password-special: The password must contain a special character
validate-data.password-uppercase: The password must contain an uppercase letter
